QuestData.Title: Visions of the Dreamer: Origins
QuestData.Description:
The spirit within the wildseed dreams of her birth and youth, in the primordial days of her world.
Go to the first Dreamshrine outside of Hibernal Hollow. Meditate at the shrine, and soothe this vision of how her life began.
QuestData.LogDescription:
Grapple with the spirit's vision of their origin.
If you leave the Vision, interact with a Dreamer's Vision portal in Dreamshrine Basin to enter again.
QuestData.RewardText: We all start somewhere. Sometimes in unexpected places. Me, I just popped out of the ground like a flower.
